variable.name: header_bgcolor
variable.description: The background color of the header

variable.name: logo
variable.description: The logo used in the layout. Use an image of 50x50 pixels for best results.

variable.name: homelink_font_family
variable.description: The title font

variable.name: homelink_color
variable.description: Title color

variable.name: homelink_hcolor
variable.description: Title hover color

variable.name: sidebar_bgcolor
variable.description: The background color of the sidebar

variable.name: closebutton_opened_image
variable.description: The image of the button to open the sidebar. Use an image of 13x14 for best results.

variable.name: closebutton_closed_image
variable.description: The image of the button to close the sidebar. Use an image of 13x14 for best results.

variable.name: tabs_group_bgcolor
variable.description: Tab bar background

variable.name: tabs_hbgcolor
variable.description: Tab background color when hovered/selected

variable.name: tabs_toc_image
variable.description: Image used for the TOC tab. Use an image of 30x22 pixels..

variable.name: tabs_toc_image_hover
variable.description: Image used for the TOC tab when hovered. Use an image of 30x22 pixels.

variable.name: tabs_idx_image
variable.description: Image used for the index tab. Use an image of 30x24 pixels.

variable.name: tabs_idx_image_hover
variable.description: Image used for the index tab when hovered. Use an image of 30x24 pixels.

variable.name: tabs_glo_image
variable.description: Image used for the glossary tab. Use an image of 34x22 pixels.

variable.name: tabs_glo_image_hover
variable.description: Image used for the glossary tab when hovered. Use an image of 34x22 pixels.

variable.name: toc_font
variable.description: The font used for TOC entries. The value 'inherit' means that the TOC will use the default page font.

variable.name: toc_tree_link_color
variable.description: Text color of TOC entries

variable.name: toc_tree_link_sbgcolor
variable.description: Background color of selected entries in the TOC

variable.name: toc_tree_close_book_image
variable.description: The closed book icon used in the desktop TOC. Use an image of 13x14 pixels.

variable.name: toc_tree_close_book_image_hover
variable.description: The closed book icon used in the desktop TOC when hovered. Use an image of 13x14 pixels.

variable.name: toc_tree_close_book_image_selected
variable.description: The closed book icon used in the desktop TOC when selected. Use an image of 13x14 pixels.

variable.name: toc_tree_open_book_image
variable.description: The open book icon used in the desktop TOC. Use an image of 14x18 pixels.

variable.name: toc_tree_open_book_image_hover
variable.description: The open book icon used in the desktop TOC when hovered. Use an image of 14x18 pixels.

variable.name: toc_tree_open_book_image_selected
variable.description: The open book icon used in the desktop TOC when selected. Use an image of 14x18 pixels.

variable.name: toc_tree_page_image
variable.description: The page icon used in the desktop TOC. Use an image of 14x18 pixels.

variable.name: toc_tree_page_image_hover
variable.description: The page icon used in the desktop TOC when hovered. Use an image of 14x18 pixels.

variable.name: toc_tree_page_image_selected
variable.description: The page icon used in the desktop TOC when selected. Use an image of 14x18 pixels.

variable.name: toc_tree_link_image
variable.description: The link icon used in the desktop TOC. Use an image of 16x15 pixels.

variable.name: toc_tree_link_image_hover
variable.description: The link icon used in the desktop TOC when hovered. Use an image of 16x15 pixels.

variable.name: toc_tree_link_image_selected
variable.description: The link icon used in the desktop TOC when selected. Use an image of 16x15 pixels.

variable.name: toc_node_font
variable.description: The font used for TOC entries. The value 'inherit' means that the TOC will use the default page font.

variable.name: toc_node_link_color
variable.description: Link color of TOC entries

variable.name: toc_node_separatorcolor
variable.description: Color of the separator between TOC entries

variable.name: toc_node_scolor
variable.description: Background of selected TOC entry

variable.name: toc_node_closebook_bgicon
variable.description: Icon used for a closed book. Use an image of 31x37 pixels.

variable.name: toc_node_openbook_bgicon
variable.description: Icon used for an opened book. Use an image of 31x38 pixels.

variable.name: toc_node_page_bgicon
variable.description: Icon used for a page. Use an image of 31x38 pixels.

variable.name: toc_node_link_bgicon
variable.description: Icon used for a link to an external page. Use an image of 33x33 pixels.

variable.name: toc_node_link_upicon
variable.description: Icon used for the link to go up a level in the TOC. Use an image of 33x33 pixels.

variable.name: toc_node_closebook_bgicon_phone
variable.description: Icon used for a closed book. Phone only. Use an image of 13x14 pixels.

variable.name: toc_node_openbook_bgicon_phone
variable.description: Icon used for an opened book. Phone only. Use an image of 15x16 pixels.

variable.name: toc_node_page_bgicon_phone
variable.description: Icon used for a page. Phone only. Use an image of 15x16 pixels.

variable.name: toc_node_link_bgicon_phone
variable.description: Icon used for a link to an external page. Phone only. Use an image of 16x15 pixels.

variable.name: toc_node_link_upicon_phone
variable.description: Icon used for the link to go up a level in the TOC. Phone only. Use an image of 15x16 pixels.

variable.name: special_pagetitle_font
variable.description: The font of the title for the mobile TOC, Index and Glossary

variable.name: special_pagetitle_color
variable.description: The color of the title for the mobile TOC, Index and Glossary

variable.name: idx_font
variable.description: The font used for index entries. The value 'inherit' means that the Index will use the default page font.

variable.name: idx_search_bg
variable.description: Background color of the index search

variable.name: idx_search_border
variable.description: Border color of the index search

variable.name: index_alphabet_color
variable.description: Color of an alphabet letter separator

variable.name: index_entry_color
variable.description: Color of an index entry

variable.name: index_entry_hcolor
variable.description: Color of an index entry when hovered

variable.name: index_link_color
variable.description: Color of an index link

variable.name: index_term_separatorcolor
variable.description: Color of the separator between index entries

variable.name: index_entry_bookbg
variable.description: Image of an index entry with multiple topics. For best results, use an image of 31x38 pixels.

variable.name: index_entrybg
variable.description: Image of an index link. For best results, use an image of 31x38 pixels.

variable.name: index_entrybookbg_phone
variable.description: Image of an index entry (phone). For best results, use an image of 14x18 pixels.

variable.name: index_entrybg_phone
variable.description: Image of an index link (phone). For best results, use an image of 14x18 pixels.

variable.name: idx_font_sidebar
variable.description: The font used for index entries. The value 'inherit' means that the Index will use the default page font.

variable.name: index_alphabet_color_sidebar
variable.description: Color of an alphabet letter separator in the sidebar

variable.name: index_alphabet_separator_color
variable.description: Color of the separator betweeen an alphabet letter and an index entry

variable.name: index_entry_color_sidebar
variable.description: Color of an index entry

variable.name: index_entry_hcolor_sidebar
variable.description: Color of an index entry when hovered

variable.name: index_link_color_sidebar
variable.description: Color of an index link

variable.name: desktop_functionholder_background
variable.description: The background color of the function bar

variable.name: desktop_functionholder_buttonhbg
variable.description: The background color of the buttons in the options bar when hovered (print, browse sequences)

variable.name: search_field_bgcolor_desktop
variable.description: Search field background

variable.name: search_field_color_desktop
variable.description: Search field text color.

variable.name: misc_home_image
variable.description: Home button image. Use an image of 26x22 pixels.

variable.name: misc_home_image_hover
variable.description: Home button image when hovered. Use an image of 26x22 pixels.

variable.name: misc_brs_next_image
variable.description: Browse sequence next button image. Use an image of 19x22 pixels.

variable.name: misc_brs_next_image_hover
variable.description: Browse sequence next button image when hovered. Use an image of 19x22 pixels.

variable.name: misc_brs_back_image
variable.description: Browse sequence back button image. Use an image of 19x22 pixels.

variable.name: misc_brs_back_image_hover
variable.description: Browse sequence back button image when hovered. Use an image of 19x22 pixels.

variable.name: misc_print_image
variable.description: Print button image. Use an image of 30x22 pixels.

variable.name: misc_print_image_hover
variable.description: Print button image when hovered. Use an image of 30x22 pixels.

variable.name: mobile_brs_next_image
variable.description: Browse sequence next button image on mobile. Use an image of 19x22 pixels.

variable.name: mobile_brs_back_image
variable.description: Browse sequence back button image on mobile. Use an image of 19x22 pixels.

variable.name: bar_bgcolor
variable.description: The background color for the mobile navigation bar

variable.name: bar_hbgcolor
variable.description: The background color used for the links when hovered.

variable.name: bar_idx_image
variable.description: The image used for the link to the Index. Use an image of 55x43 for best results.

variable.name: bar_idx_himage
variable.description: The image used for the link to the Index when hovered. Use an image of 55x43 for best results.

variable.name: bar_idx_image_phone
variable.description: The image used for the link to the Index (phone only). Use an image of 30x23 for best results.

variable.name: bar_idx_himage_phone
variable.description: The image used for the link to the Index when hovered (phone only). Use an image of 30x24 for best results.

variable.name: bar_toc_image
variable.description: The image used for the link to the TOC. Use an image of 55x41 for best results.

variable.name: bar_toc_himage
variable.description: The image used for the link to the TOC when hovered. Use an image of 55x41 for best results.

variable.name: bar_toc_image_phone
variable.description: The image used for the link to the TOC (phone only). Use an image of 30x22 for best results.

variable.name: bar_toc_himage_phone
variable.description: The image used for the link to the TOC when hovered (phone only). Use an image of 30x22 for best results.

variable.name: bar_glo_image
variable.description: The image used for the link to the glossary. Use an image of 55x37 for best results.

variable.name: bar_glo_himage
variable.description: The image used for the link to the glossary when hovered. Use an image of 55x37 for best results.

variable.name: bar_glo_image_phone
variable.description: The image used for the link to the glossary (phone only). Use an image of 30x20 for best results.

variable.name: bar_glo_himage_phone
variable.description: The image used for the link to the glossary when hovered (phone only). Use an image of 30x20 for best results.

variable.name: bar_fts_image
variable.description: The image used for the link to the search. Use an image of 55x55 for best results.

variable.name: bar_fts_himage
variable.description: The image used for the link to the search when hovered. Use an image of 55x55 for best results.

variable.name: bar_fts_image_phone
variable.description: The image used for the link to the search (phone only). Use an image of 30x30 for best results.

variable.name: bar_fts_himage_phone
variable.description: The image used for the link to the search when hovered (phone only). Use an image of 30x30 for best results.

variable.name: bar_topic_image
variable.description: The image used for the link to the topic. Use an image of 55x45 for best results.

variable.name: bar_topic_image_phone
variable.description: The image used for the link to the topic (phone only). Use an image of 30x23 for best results.

variable.name: glo_font
variable.description: The font used for glossary entries. The value 'inherit' means that the TOC will use the default page font.

variable.name: glo_search_bg
variable.description: Background color of the glossary search

variable.name: glo_search_border
variable.description: Border color of the glossary search

variable.name: glossary_alphabet_color
variable.description: Color of an alphabet letter separator

variable.name: glossary_term_color
variable.description: Color of a glossary term

variable.name: glossary_term_hcolor
variable.description: Color of a glossary term when hovered

variable.name: glossary_term_separatorcolor
variable.description: Color of the separator between glossary terms

variable.name: glossary_definition_color
variable.description: Color of a glossary definition

variable.name: glo_font_sidebar
variable.description: The font used for glossary entries. The value 'inherit' means that the TOC will use the default page font.

variable.name: glossary_alphabet_color_desktop
variable.description: Color of an alphabet letter separator in the sidebar

variable.name: glossary_alphabet_separator_color
variable.description: Color of the separator betweeen an alphabet letter and a glossary term. Also the color in front of a definition.

variable.name: glossary_term_color_sidebar
variable.description: Color of a glossary term

variable.name: glossary_term_hcolor_sidebar
variable.description: Color of a glossary term when hovered

variable.name: glossary_definition_color_sidebar
variable.description: Color of a glossary definition

variable.name: fts_font
variable.description: The font used to display search results. The value 'inherit' means that the TOC will use the default page font.

variable.name: searchfield_bg
variable.description: The background color of the search field

variable.name: searchfield_border
variable.description: The border color of the search field

variable.name: search_image
variable.description: The image used as button to start the search. For best results, use an image of 24x24 pixels.

variable.name: search_close_bgimage
variable.description: The image when advanced search options are hidden. Use an image of 22x22 pixels for best results.

variable.name: search_open_bgimage
variable.description: The image when advanced search options are shown. Use an image of 22x22 pixels for best results.

variable.name: switch_bgimage
variable.description: The image used for the On/Off switch. Use an image with both the on and off switch with dimensions 58x52 pixels. (One switch is 29x26 pixels.)

variable.name: switch_onoff_color
variable.description: The color of the text on the On/Off switch

variable.name: search_count
variable.description: Background of the selection box for number of search results

variable.name: search_count_image
variable.uiname: Number of results drop down icon
variable.description: Drop down image of the selection box for number of search results. Works only on Chrome and Safari. Use an image of 28x27 pixels.

variable.name: advanced_toggle_text
variable.description: Color of the advanced search options text.

variable.name: search_message_text
variable.description: Color of the search message text.

variable.name: search_message_separator
variable.description: Separator color

variable.name: search_result_title_color
variable.description: Color of the found page title.

variable.name: search_result_title_hcolor
variable.description: Color of the found page title when hovered.

variable.name: search_result_url_color
variable.description: The color of the url of the found topic.

variable.name: search_result_text_color
variable.description: The color of the topic text shown as preview.

variable.name: search_result_curpage_color
variable.description: Result current page link color

variable.name: search_result_page_color
variable.description: Result page link color

variable.name: next_search_page_bgimage
variable.description: The image to go to the next page with search results. Use an image of 33x37 pixels for best results.

variable.name: back_search_page_bgimage
variable.description: The image to go to the previous page with search results. Use an image of 33x37 pixels for best results.

variable.name: body_font_family
variable.description: The default font. Changing this font changes the TOC, Index, Glossary and Search results. (Only works if you do not set a font for any of these elements.)

variable.name: body_font_color
variable.description: The default text color. All elements without a custom color will use this color. (Also works for topic content.)

variable.name: search_result_highlight_color
variable.description: The highlight color for search results in the current topic.

variable.name: search_result_highlight_text_color
variable.description: The text color for highlighted search results in the current topic.

variable.name: top_link_bgimage
variable.description: Image used for the back to top link. Use an image of 19x18 pixels.

variable.name: webkit_scrollbar_track
variable.description: The background color of scrollbar. Only works on Chrome and Safari.

variable.name: webkit_scrollbar_thumb
variable.description: The color of scrollbar highlight. Only works on Chrome and Safari.

variable.name: content_bgcolor
variable.description: The background color of the page content. This is the section that holds the topic content.

element.value: Border color of the search field
element.name: ID_DESC_GLO_SEARCH_BORDER_DESKTOP
